name: Everything MCP Server - MCP Official Example
notes: This MCP server attempts to utilize all the functions of the MCP protocol. It is not intended to be a practical/useful server; instead, it serves as a test server for developers of MCP clients. It implements features such as prompts, tools, resources, and sampling to demonstrate the capabilities of MCP.

name: Calculator Server - MCP Official Example
notes: This is an example service for an MCP calculator. This example is primarily used to demonstrate how to launch an MCP service with the Streamable HTTP protocol using hosted mode and private code packages.

name: AutoNavi Maps MCP Server (Map Control Protocol Server) via the Streamable HTTP Protocol - MCP Official Example
notes:
This is a quick access example for AutoNavi Maps MCP Server (Map Control Protocol Server) via the Streamable HTTP Protocol.
To obtain the KEY (API Key): Please visit the AutoNavi Open Platform Console (URL: https://console.amap.com/dev/index). If you do not have a developer account yet, please register as a developer first.

name: AutoNavi Maps MCP Server (Map Control Protocol Server) via the SSE Protocol - MCP Official Example

name: AutoNavi Maps MCP Server (Map Control Protocol Server) via the STDIO Protocol - MCP Official Example
notes:
This is a quick access example for AutoNavi Maps MCP Server (Map Control Protocol Server) via the STDIO Protocol (Standard Input/Output Protocol).
To obtain the KEY (API Key): Please visit the AutoNavi Open Platform Console (URL: https://lbs.amap.com/api/mcp-server/gettingstarted). If you do not have a developer account yet, please register as a developer first.
